name: Breaker Weight
description:
A Breakout style game submitted for the 162th trijam with the theme: Its All Connected

When you break a block it will drop "Bits". These bits will collide with your paddle and connect to it. These bits are heavy though, you will start to notice them weighing down you paddle.  Luckily you can get rid of them, all you have to do is get the ball to hit those pesky things and they will go bye bye
